Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Western
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Western and 63rd: due to, fire department activity near 63rd/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, California, 59th, Western, 63rd and over the regular route, due to fire department activity near 63rd/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
